# Do NOT place real database URLs in .env.shared.
# Put secrets like DATABASE_URL only in .env.development or .env.production.
#
# Tools in TekupVault accept any of these variable names:
# - DATABASE_URL
# - SUPABASE_DB_URL
# - POSTGRES_URL
# - VAULT_DATABASE_URL
#
# Example format (do not commit real credentials):
# VAULT_DATABASE_URL=postgresql://USER:PASSWORD@HOST:5432/postgres?sslmode=require
#
# You can run the TekupVault DB connectivity test by passing the URL explicitly, e.g. in PowerShell:
# pnpm --filter @tekupvault/vault-api exec node tools/test-supabase-connection.js db=$Env:VAULT_DATABASE_URL
